name: easypanel
tagline: A control panel for deploying and managing applications on personal servers

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Deploy Docker containers and applications through a visual interface without command-line complexity

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor resource usage, manage services, and control server settings from a unified dashboard

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Set up custom domains, SSL certificates, and reverse proxy rules through the web interface

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Create and manage PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Redis instances with automatic backups and monitoring

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share server access with team members using role-based permissions for controlled management

features.title: Automated Backups
features.description: Schedule regular backups of applications and databases with easy restoration options
